tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE high_risk_transactions (
 transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 amount DECIMAL,
 customer_id UUID,
 is_high_risk BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    risk_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE high_risk_transactions (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_date DATE,
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  customer_id INT,
  risk_score FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
  transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  transaction_date DATE,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(20),
  amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    customer_id INT,
    is_high_risk BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    customer_email VARCHAR(50),
    customer_phone VARCHAR(15)
)

CREATE TABLE risk_factors (
    factor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    factor_description VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    risk_factor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (transaction_id) REFERENCES transactions(transaction_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (risk_factor_id) REFERENCES risk_factors(factor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE high_risk_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE,
    customer_id INT,
    risk_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE transactions_blacklist (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    blacklist_reason TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE transaction_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    log_message TEXT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE customer_details (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name TEXT,
    customer_email TEXT,
    contact_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE risk_score_parameters (
    risk_score INT PRIMARY KEY,
    risk_description TEXT
)
